attractions.name: Silver Star
attractions.description: As one of Europe's tallest and fastest roller coasters, Silver Star offers an exhilarating experience with its towering heights and swift descents.

attractions.name: Blue Fire Megacoaster
attractions.description: This launch coaster propels riders from 0 to 100 km/h in just 2.5 seconds, featuring multiple inversions and high-speed twists.

attractions.name: Wodan â€“ Timburcoaster
attractions.description: A wooden coaster that combines traditional design with modern engineering, providing a smooth yet thrilling ride through intricate wooden structures.

attractions.name: Voletarium
attractions.description: Europe's largest flying theater that simulates a flight over various European landmarks, offering a breathtaking aerial journey.
